abilities.desc: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area.  Deals half damage to structures.
abilities.name: Nether Blast

abilities.desc: A powerful banishing spell that slows a unit and renders it unable to attack or be attacked. Afflicted units take extra magic damage. Can be cast while channeling.
abilities.name: Decrepify
abilities.notes: Can be used on your Nether Ward.

abilities.desc: Pugna places a Nether Ward at the target location. The ward will fire at any enemy hero who casts a spell dealing base damage plus the damage multiplier of the mana spent by the enemy hero.
abilities.name: Nether Ward
abilities.notes: Illusions and creeps deal 25% damage to Nether Ward.

abilities.desc: CHANNELED - When cast on an enemy, Pugna drains health from the target enemy unit to heal himself and granting vision over the target. If Pugna has full HP, and the enemy target is a Hero, Life Drain will restore mana instead.When cast on an ally, Pugna will drain his own health into his ally.
abilities.name: Life Drain
abilities.notes: Illusions are destroyed on the first tick of damage.
